# About Me

I am an adjunct professor with the Computer and Information Science (CISC) Department at Fordham University.

I also work for Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (PNNL, "The Lab") as my day job on the HPC team.

You can see my CV on my personal website at:

[https://cameronrutherford.quarto.pub/camerons-git-site/resume/resume.html](https://cameronrutherford.quarto.pub/camerons-git-site/resume/resume.html)

My interests are in:

- Mathematics
- High Performance Computing (HPC)
- Quantum Computing
- DevOps, MLOps
- Software packaging, Containerization
